price: A da nije Allahove dobrote prema vama i milosti Njegove i da Allah ne prima pokajanje i da mudar nije…
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu wa-anna al-laha tawwābun ḥakīmun
